content: c w n y rochet rap in ovelty arn wear it as a wrap shawl scarf or hip warmer designed by lisa gentry materials appr 5 3 oz/150 g bulky novelty yarn used in pattern moda dea fur ever 69% polyester 32% nylon 1 76 oz/50 g per skein 3 skeins #3924 cinnamon twist yarn needle crochet hook us m-13 9 mm or n-15 10 mm 1 skill schematic gauge gauge is hard to measure with this yarn use the size hook that is best for you see the schematic for approximate finished measurements instructions note every double_crochet and treble_crochet is worked between stitches except on row 1 chain loosely 45 sts row 1 right side double_crochet in fifth chain from hook and in each chain across row turn 42 double_crochet row 2 chain 4 work 4 double_crochet between first 2 double_crochet than work double_crochet in each double_crochet across ending with 4 double_crochet in skipped chain-4 loop from beginning row turn row 3-7 repeat row 2 row 8 chain 4 double_crochet between each double_crochet across row row 9 chain 5 treble_crochet between each double_crochet across row fasten_off finishing weave in yarns use any pin for closure if needed abbreviations appr = approximately chain = chain double_crochet = double_crochet sts = stitches treble_crochet = treble_crochet copyright 2007 ©lisa gentry hook & needle designs llc 212 spruce drive chatham la 71226 www hookandneedledesigns com 2
